snippet.title: Goblins & Grottos Trailer 2016
snippet.description:
Today, players will be able to play through 7 all-new maps and see the conclusion to the main story. Players will also be able to create and share their own levels with the updated story mode creator.

Get the game at steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/389190/

http://www.goblinsandgrottos.com/

You play as a nameless goblin whose family has been murdered by a level 100 paladin. Journey through forests, towns and mountains as you track down your family’s killer, while avoiding loot hungry adventurers looking for an opportunity to level up.

Goblins & Grottos features handcrafted levels, a custom soundtrack with over 14 unique tracks and a very powerful map editor allowing players to create their own stories for others to enjoy.
